Html:
Couldn't find a similar post asking, so...

 

Any chance of getting a way to import talents via URL, like Wowhead's talent calculator does? An export talent would be nice too; I use Talented which can take URLs for talent builds and set them up as templates. I just finished working on my bear, and am trying to work on my cat, but either character profiler doesn't pull secondary specs, or I don't know how to convince it to show them... There is a 'cat' in the dropdown for my second talent spec, but it's not the one I'm using. I know I can set them manually, but it would be nice if I could just export from Talented and import...
Secondary Specs are not loaded, no. Importing/Exporting to/from URLs would be nice, we plan to get that in, in a later version.
Cool. Just figured I'd mention it in case nobody else had. Thanks...
